atomic_tests.name: Keychain Dump
atomic_tests.description:
This command will dump keychain credential information from login.keychain. 
Source: https://www.loobins.io/binaries/security/

### Keychain File path
  ~/Library/Keychains/
  /Library/Keychains/
  /Network/Library/Keychains/
  [Security Reference](https://developer.apple.com/legacy/library/documentation/Darwin/Reference/ManPages/man1/security.1.html)

atomic_tests.name: Export Certificate Item(s)
atomic_tests.description: This command finds all certificate items and sends the output to local file in pem format.

input_arguments.description: Specify the path of the certificates to export.

atomic_tests.name: Import Certificate Item(s) into Keychain
atomic_tests.description: This command will import a certificate pem file into a keychain.

input_arguments.description: Specify the path of the pem certificate file to import.

atomic_tests.name: Copy Keychain using cat utility
atomic_tests.description: This command will copy the keychain using the cat utility in a manner similar to Atomic Stealer.

input_arguments.description: Specify the path to copy they keychain into.
